ABOUT US

Win Flow Engineering Co. Ltd is an instrumentation company, incorporated in Myanmar. Since 2016, WIN FLOW was trying to develop the unique capabilities in engineering systems and integrating quality instrumentation for Oil and Gas industries.

See More

SERVICES

  • Installation Supervision
  • Commissioning and Start-up
  • Emergency Service Support
  • Contract Maintenance and Call Out Services
  • Training and On-site System Inspection
  • System Upgrades
See More

PRODUCTS

  • Process Analyzers and Systems
  • Fire and Gas Detection Systems
  • Power Instruments
  • Flame Safeguard and Burner
  • Liquid Metering Systems
  • Gas Metering Systems
See More

CONTACT US

Address No. 199 , Wai hin Street, Wai Bar Gi 7 quarter, North Okhlapa Township.
Phone +95 9 4316 9796
Email win@winfloweng.com

#hamburger-button {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 9999; /*so it never gets lost under something*/
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: top;
  height:40px;
  width:40px;
  margin-left:10px;
  margin-top: 23px;
}

#hamburger-button:hover {
  cursor: pointer;
  /* changes the cursor to pointer */
}

#hamburger-button > span {
  display: block;
  height: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 6px;
  width: 40px;
  background-color: #AEADAD;
 -webkit-transition-timing-function: linear; /* Safari and Chrome */
transition-timing-function: linear;
transition-duration:1s;
}
   

#hamburger-button.open > span:first-child {
-webkit-transform: translateY(6px) rotate(45deg); /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
transform:translateY(18px) rotate(45deg);
}


#hamburger-button.open > span:nth-child(2) {
   -webkit-transform: rotateY(90deg); /* Safari */
    transform: rotateY(90deg);
  /* rotates the second child on the Y AXIS ONLY 90 degrees so it disappears into a point */
}

#hamburger-button.open > span:last-child {
 -webkit-transform: translateY(-6px) rotate(-45deg); /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
    transform: translateY(-6px) rotate(-45deg);
}


.navbar{
  position:absolute;
  opacity:0.7;
  z-index:888; /*so its above the content but below the burger button*/
  height: 100vh;
  width: 180px;
  left:-100vw;
  transition:1.5s;
  background-color:black;
  color:white;
}

.navbar.open{
  left:0;
}
.navbar ul{
  list-style:none;
  margin-top:40%;
font-family: "Seravek";
  font-size:1.1em;
}

.navbar ul li{
  border-bottom:1px solid white;
  margin-bottom:10px;
  padding:5px;
  text-align:left;
}

.navbar ul li a{
  margin-bottom:10px;
  padding:5px;
  text-align:left;
  color: white;
   text-decoration: none;
  }

.navbar ul li:hover{
  text-shadow:1px 1px 3px blue;
  cursor:pointer;
}
